post.body: i wnder if there are any bids being taken for jobs at this party. being in IL, I wouln't doubt it LOL
keeping my fingers crossed 4 U
trying to write a letter for assistance on more mom entrepreneur support and recognition
Ohhh, I found it, cool site -thanks for pointing it out! :)
that would be great! I am still learning a lot with twitter...it's like a foreign language for me.
A big smootch? curious but what is friendorfollow?
*hiding my face in shame* Yes, I got them all mangled and had to turn off the vacuum really fast to avoid a real mess
I have a Dyson and there is nothing unless it is a handle thing
LOL, so I have noticed. I kind of took up a few strands of carpet, lol.
yeah, wasn't my fav song for the kids to hear or sing along to.
So funny! Gianna is like that too, she loves Pink and Fergie, lol
nah, I don't need any more 'real' kids, just the fake adult one is ok, lol
I wouldn't have it in my living room, the basement is a nice place for one, lol.
well it is a day to day thing but he worked today so I can't complain! :) Tomorrow is another day but it is a short day for him
That could work - I can get him a day with his 7 yr old to play 9 holes
Ok, I'm clueless on what that is, so I have to reseach, lol.
he's so anal he'd probably tell the instructor s/he isn't doing it right, lol.
OMG, we were just talking about those! I have to check them out!
never heard of it, where can I get some! :)
OOOOO, then I am for sure heading to @Starbucks tomorrow!!! I really have a taste for it badly!
I think they have hot chocolate, I guess I can ask them to add some peppermint in there somehow, lol.
We are right next to naperville in Illinois! So more winds are coming your way! LOL
Nope, sitting pretty in the Windy City...well the suburbs about 40 miles southwest of the city, lol.
nah, you're only 1 hr ahead of me, it's 12:37 here now
yes for sure Friday! How is the morning for you...where are you at anyway, did I figure out time zones yet, lol?
I am so sorry I forgot to call you today! I was so busy -in the zone cleaning!
Yes they would be, cause he is sure to fall in love with a teeny tiny photo of muwah
won't say a word! My neighbor was getting all teary eyed, me-not so much, still in awe with Brad....mmmm -snapping out of it now! LOL
It was a good movie. Kind of Forrest Gump-ish type of a movie. Best part...Brad Pitt...he's so dreamy & steamy all rolled into one!
I agree! I can't wait until my kids go back to school so I can have a break! LOL
Congrats to you! :) I need 61 to go and I will be able to feel awesome too! :D
LOL, I was more blunt...why did you call me to talk about nothing? I have things to do, I'll see you in 10 minutes!
hey its a free meal and a night w/o kids anyway
on our way to a holiday party from the company that laid steve off, should be a great time
Sad thing is I still have about 5 hours of work left from the week! :(
OMG, I need sleep! I can't believe I have been up this long!!! No wonder I feel dizzy half the day, lack of sleep can only be a bad thing!
my brain hurts
can anyone make me a puzzle piece in a document form that takes up a whole sheet of paper?
How do you vacuum a high shag carpet?
funny, my 4 year old is singing Nervana while playing Rockband, lol
I'm tired and achy. I want to go to bed. I have to make 2 batches of grandma's special choc chip cookies and do some shopping b4 the storm
Last call: We are sending gift bags to Adam Sandler, Ashlee Simpson and Joely Fisher. If you are interested email me at info@babyswags.com
I can't believe it is 3 already. I didn't even make the cookies yet! :(
I need one big $100.00 gift for my husband...any ideas? He is not techy, kind of simple, loves football, baseball and golf! LOL
For more information on Project Believe go to http://babyswagspr.wordpress.com/
Those interested in Project Believe, email me at projectbelieve@babyswags.com & provide me w/a photo of yourself & family working if poss.
Getting ready to make special chocolate chip cookies from scratch, no nestle recipe here! Then I have to get some real work done
Hi new followers! Great to meet you! Feel free to jump right into my conversations with myself! :)
Enter to win LibraKnit baby hat - http://tinyurl.com/3l43bl
Good morning, or should I say afternoon?
Im all achy and miserable! :( I hate being sick. I don't do sick well. I just hope I am better before Christmas! That'd suck if I wasn't
New year will bring new changes for www.babyswags.com - Theme will be "back to the basics" -do what works!
Happy New Year all my Twitter friends!
Okey dokey, off to bed for me! I have done all my updates that I can do for now. Kids will be up soon and the day will start all over.
Holiday Gifts Baby Swags Style: Baby Swags sent off it’s 2008 holiday gift bags that were a part of the co.. http://tinyurl.com/75obxh
It's freakin windy out tonight. I hear all kinds of things banging into my house.
Actually, I am really hoping Brad Pitt sees it and falls in love with me, lmao...hey, I can dream, especially after seeing him in his movie!
<------ Like my new sexy picture? Figured y'all would like to see what I really look like instead of my business info. :)
Just got back from seeing Benjamin Button and where the heck did this coldness come from?
2008 - glad to see you go! :) Bring on 09 with all it's frills and thrills!
